OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM.
Order affirmed.

casebody.head_matter:
367 A.2d 1090
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. R. J. DOLAN, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 4, 1976.
Decided Jan. 28, 1977.
Central Pa. Legal Services, James E. Tarman, Harrisburg, for appellant.
■ Robert E. Rains, Dep. Atty. Gen., Harrisburg, for appellee.
Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
